item.title: MacBook Pro „ÅßOpenPose
item.description: While studying machine learning and Deep Leaning articles on MacBook Pro, I posted an article that you can detect posture on Mac I found some and tried variously, but it worked, so I will write it as a memorandum. #environment MacBook Pro 15in 2018 2.2 GHz Core i7 32GB Memory Mojave 10.14.6 python 3.7.5 Install python, virtualenv and wget with homebrew Setup steps Preparation In preparation, set up a Python virtual environment.
